entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
